verses.verse: A Song <WH7892> of degrees. <WH4609> Many <WH7227> a time <WH7227> have they afflicted <WH6887> me from my youth, <WH5271> may Israel <WH3478> now <WH4994> say: <WH559>
Many <WH7227> a time <WH7227> have they afflicted <WH6887> me from my youth: <WH5271> yet <WH1571> they have not prevailed <WH3201> against me.
The plowers <WH2790> plowed <WH2790> on my back: <WH1354> they made long <WH748> their furrows. <WH4618>
The LORD <WH3068> is righteous: <WH6662> he has cut <WH7112> asunder the cords <WH5688> of the wicked. <WH7563>
Let them all <WH3605> be confounded <WH954> and turned <WH5472> back <WH268> that hate <WH8130> Zion. <WH6726>
Let them be as the grass <WH2682> on the housetops, <WH1406> which wither <WH3001> before <WH6924> it grows <WH8025> up:
With which the mower <WH7114> fills <WH4390> not his hand; <WH3709> nor he that binds <WH6014> sheaves <WH485> his bosom. <WH2683>
Neither <WH3808> do they which go <WH5674> by say, <WH559> The blessing <WH1293> of the LORD <WH3068> be on you: we bless <WH1288> you in the name <WH8034> of the LORD. <WH3068>
